name: Proreptile
description:
In Proreptile you will witness the story of Lizardo, a brave little reptile that was caught in the middle of a war that nobody wanted. He will try his best, but he can't do anything to stop it. Literally. 

This was a task for a Master's Degree in Videogames. I do not own the graphics, the music and sound effects. The graphics are all from HiClipart.

Music:

- Donkey Kong Country Returns OST - Mistery Of The Key

- Donkey Kong Country Returns OST - Bobbling Basalt

Sound Effects:

- Ambience

- War Sounds
